p:
Germacrene D, myrcene, α-Pinene, β-Caryophyllene, and 1-Pentadecene were the major compositions of essential oil of E.purpurea grown in very fine-grade (< 0.5 mm) perlite with 50:50 v/v perlite to peat moss ratio (Tables 3 and 4). The compositions have a valuable beneficial effects in medicine and agriculture industries
7 .
